Package net.trajano.sonar.plugins.reverseproxyauth

Reverse Proxy Authenticator plugin for Sonar.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Extensions
    Extensions used by the plugin.
    ReverseProxyAuthenticator
    Implementation of the authenticator that assumes the value in the header is a valid user.
    ReverseProxyAuthPlugin
    Plugin entry point.
    ReverseProxyAuthRealm
    Realm.
    ReverseProxyAuthUsersProvider
    This provides the user details.
    ValidateRedirectionFilter
    This filter redirects the current request to /reverseproxyauth/validate.
